hero.description: Passionate Software Developer dedicated to creating solutions.
about.title: About Me
about.description:
I am Federico Moretto, a passionate FrontEnd Developer and Bachelor of Computer Science student. Currently, I work as a freelance developer and have over 3 years of experience in foreign trade, in which I also obtained a bachelor's degree.

With technical skills in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript, and frameworks like React.JS, Next.JS, y React Native, I excel as a web developer specialized in creating fluid and engaging user experiences. Additionally, I have experience in responsive design and web performance optimization.

My focus on FrontEnd development is complemented by knowledge in Java y Python for backend development, making me a versatile candidate capable of working on Full Stack projects.

I am a creative and results-oriented individual, always seeking new ways to solve problems and improve efficiency. I stand out as a team player and enjoy collaborating with others to achieve common goals.

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.firstDescription: I am open to new job opportunities. You can contact me through my social media or by sending me an email.
contact.secondDescription: I'll leave you a download link for my resume.
